TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a cookie, I first need to craft wheat. Wheat requires placing 1 hay_block in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the hay_block from slot 30 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cookie
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "enderman_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 20}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 10, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 9, "index": 39}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 7, "index": 44}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the wheat and now need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
